definitions.definition: An arthropod in the class Insecta, characterized by six legs, up to four wings, and a chitinous exoskeleton.
definitions.example: Our shed has several insect infestions, including ants, yellowjackets, and wasps.

definitions.definition: Any small arthropod similar to an insect including spiders, centipedes, millipedes, etc
definitions.example: The swamp is swarming with every sort of insect.
The manager’s assistant was the worst sort of insect.
